DOC.brief_summary: Glycemic index concept widely use determine impact food blood glucose . Several study show water content intake meal may influence glycemic response meal thus effect result GI measurement . Currently study find conflict result . Therefore , study aim determine whether water intake , specifically meal , may influence glycemic response glycemic index value meal .
DOC.brief_title: Water Intake Glycemic Response : Preliminary Study
DOC.detailed_description: Glycemic index method perform accord Food Agricultural Organization/WHO recommendation .
